name: superbomb
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an extremely powerful bomb, for example a nuclear bomb : The US had just tested its new superbomb. International observers have been watching with interest since the country's test detonation of a super bomb. It would take many years to develop a single super-bomb.
More examplesFewer examplesThe superbomb could kill large numbers of soldiers without destroying the surrounding coutryside.The government poured large amounts of money into developing the hydrogen superbomb.The main reason for developing super-bombs is to be able to destroy a huge area with just one bomb.He believed that a super bomb should never be produced.
